ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Yes - essential course for anyone studying political economy or interested in distributive justice.

The course presents interesting perspectives. The instructor's strong (pun intended) view and analytical rigor make the course a unique one that challenges the mainstream view that dominates the current curriculum.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Important building blocks for my dissertation.
open up ideas and interests for future research on very important and topical questions.
